"oh, and one more thing, I'm not sure how but apparently your files got mixed up or something and it seems you're host family is expecting a girl... not a boy." Andi said, chuckling as she recalled how she had a hacker friend do that.

"what?!? Andi please don't" but the call had already ended.

Just after he put his luggage away he sat in his seat and began to change... this was bad, he may just be stuck as a girl for the whole school semester

info.brief_description: A brother and Sister discover that they have to change the others gender and clothing.
info.description:
Sean and Andi discover that they have the powers to transform the other's gender and clothes limitlessly...

Sean is 18 and a senior in high school, he has the ability to change the sex and clothing of his younger sister Andi, to those of a boy, but he is the weaker of the 2 siblings with the power. so it takes more effort and time to work.

Andi, short for Andrea, a girl, 16 a sophomore in high school, she has the ability to change Sean into a girl through simply wishing it. She is a happy go lucky kind of girl, she loves changing Sean into a girl. She has the better control of her gift allowing her to change her brother quickly and can even do it from far away, she also enjoys being a boy, though Sean doesn't change her much.

No death
No incest
No ending the story
